title: History and Tales of the Crusades - Collection 4
description:
History and Tales of the Crusades - Collection 4:

We have 22 titles here:

-  Andrea - Contemporary Sources for the Fourth Crusade, Rev. Ed. (2008)

-  Dickson - The Children's Crusade; Medieval History, Modern Mythistory (2008)

-  Ebied & Thomas - Muslim-Christian Polemic During the Crusades (2005)

-  Frankopan - The First Crusades; the Call from the East (2012)

-  Friedman - Encounter between Enemies; Captivity and Ransom in the Latin Kingdom of Jerusalem (2001)

-  Gladysz - The Forgotten Crusaders; Poland and the Crusader Movement in the Twelfth and Thirteenth Centuries (2012)

-  Housley (Ed.) - Crusading in the Fifteenth Century; Message and Impact (2004)

-  Jensen - Denmark and the Crusades, 1400-1650 (2007)

-  Kostick - The Siege of Jerusalem; Crusade and Conquest in 1099 (2009)

-  Kostick - The Social Structure of the First Crusade (2008)

-  Laiou - Urbs Capta; The Fourth Crusade and its Consequences (2005)

-  Maalouf - The Crusades through Arab Eyes (1984)

-  Madden - The Concise History of the Crusades, 3e (2014)

-  Nicolle - Acre 1291; Bloody Sunset of the Crusader States (2005)

-  Nicolle - The Second Crusade, 1148; Disaster Outside Damascus (2009)

-  Nicolle - The Third Crusade 1191; Richard the Lionheart, Saladin and the Struggle for Jerusalem (2006)

-  Payne - The Dream and the Tomb; a History of the Crusades (1984)

-  Riley-Smith - The First Crusade and the Idea of Crusading (1993)

-  Rogerson - The Last Crusaders; East, West and the Battle for the Centre of the World (2009)

-  Rubenstein - Armies of Heaven; the First Crusade and the Quest for Apocalypse (2011)

-  Smail - Crusading Warfare, 1097-1193, 2e (1995)

-  Tyerman - The Crusades; a Brief Insight (2007)
